name: Sheepwreck
description:
Play as a sheep, one that survived a boat crash, and collect your friends to increase your destruction power and break obstacles in your path!
This game is a submission to Brackey's game jam, where the theme is "Stronger Together". We worked around this theme by having wrecking power of multiple sheep be stronger than the single sheep. The more sheep you have, the longer you survive, and the more chances you get to break your highest score in this infinite runner. We hope you enjoy!

Ash (Me!), Dodo (https://www.instagram.com/dalistrations/?hl=en), Kerro(https://itch.io/profile/quantumgraphie) ,  Afif (https://itch.io/profile/rishene), Kratos(https://itch.io/profile/rebelmodex)
